LECTURE SCHEDULE

Lecture
Week (dates) M W
Unit 1: Dynamics of unstructured populations
1 (Jan. 7 & 9) Intro to WILD3810 Abundance
2 (Jan. 14 & 16) Density-independent population growth Density-dependent population growth
3 (Jan. 21 & 23) MLK Holiday - no class Declining populations
4 (Jan. 28 & 30) Stochastic population dynamics Dynamics of small populations
5 (Feb. 4 & 6) Guest lecture - scientific writing Exam 1
Unit 2: Dynamics of structured populations
6 (Feb. 11 & 13) Review Exam 1 Life tables
7 (Feb. 18 & 20) President’s Day - no class Life-history diversity
8 (Feb. 25 & 27) Survival estimation Age-structured dynamics
9 (Mar. 4 & 6) Matrix models Buffer
10 (Mar. 11 & 13) Spring break - no class Spring break - no class
11 (Mar. 18 & 20) Sensitivity and elasticity Life history strategies
12 (Mar. 25 & 27) Exam 2 Review exam 2
Unit 3: Spatial dynamics
13 (Apr. 1 & 3) Metapopulation dynamics Source-sink dynamics
14 (Apr. 8 & 10) Occupancy Buffer
Unit 4: Species interactions
15 (Apr. 15 & 17) Competition Predator-prey dynamics
16 (Apr. 22 & 24) Harvest dynamics No class
